channel.title: Homes on Jiangang Shu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jiangang Shu

item.description: I am currently a Postdoctoral Fellow in the Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong (CityU). My supervisor is Prof. Xiaohua Jia. I obtained Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from City University of Hong Kong in Feb., 2019., M.Eng. degree in Computer Science and Technology, and B.Eng. degree in Network Technology and Engineering from Nanjing University of Information Science & Technology in 2015 and 2012, respectively. From Feb. 2018 to Aug.
